data.eml:eml: Description of Floresorchestia samroiyodensis, a new species of landhopper (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Talitridae) from Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Azman, B. A. R., Wongkamhaeng, K., Dumrongrojwattana, P. (2014): Description of Floresorchestia samroiyodensis, a new species of landhopper (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Talitridae) from Thailand. Zoosystematics and Evolution 90 (1): 7-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.90.7085, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.90.7085
